name: Mega Link Downloader Bot
description: This is a telegram bot to download mega.nz links.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode! (Don't change anything in this field!)

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from https://t.me/BotFather and enter the token here

Log_channel_id.description: Make a channel and add your bot as an admin to it. This channel is for logging the details when processes are started and finished. Input the channel's id here.ðŸ‘‡ If you don't know how to get the channel id send a message in the channel and forward it to https://t.me/AH_ForwarderBot and copy the chat id and enter it in the below field (must include -100 in front)

Log_channel_username.description: The username of the log channel you created above! (must enter with '@' in the front of the username)

Bot_username.description: Your bot's telegram username (must enter with '@' in the front of the username)

Mega_email.description: This is not necessary! Enter your mega email only if you have a mega.nz account with pro/business features.

Mega_password.description: This is not necessary! Enter your mega password only if you have a mega.nz account with pro/business features.
